New Records: Kusal Mendis scored 122 off 77 balls, the fastest hundred by a Sri Lankan in World Cup history
Sadeera Samarawickrama made his maiden ODI century with 108 off 89 balls
Hasan Ali claimed four wickets for Pakistan
Key Match Events: Mendis and Nissanka formed a 102-run partnership
Samarawickrama continued the innings after Mendis' dismissal
Pakistan's bowling struggled, with Shaheen Afridi and Shadab Khan conceding runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw high scores from both teams
Sri Lanka achieved their highest World Cup total against a Full Member
Others: The match was a significant performance for Sri Lanka's batting lineup
